casebody.data:
Robert MANCINI
v.
CONCORDE GROUP, INC. and Howard Gordon and Valerie Bradley Petition of: Concorde Group, Inc. and Howard Gordon Robert Mancini
v.
Concorde Group and Howard Gordon and Valerie Bradley Petition of: Valerie Bradley No. 585 MAL 2017
No. 617 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 14, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 14th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
